DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the proposed research is to investigate the effects of novel snack products differing in macronutrient composition, fibre and sugar content on post-prandial glycemia and short-term appetite control in healthy adults.
DOC.brief_title: Innovation of Breakfast Cereals and Snacks for Control of Appetite and Post-Prandial Glycemia
DOC.criteria: Healthy, nonsmoking individuals aged 1855 years with a body mass index of 20.029.9 kg/m2 Smokers, individuals with diabetes or other cardiometabolic diseases, persons who suffer from gastrointestinal disorders or have had gastric surgery, or people who regularly use bulk laxatives Women with irregular menstruation or who use hormonal contraceptives or hormone replacement therapy Individuals who regularly skip breakfast, have allergies to any of the test food ingredients, or who follow a restrictive diet
